Articles.Content: At this (very kerbal) 8)

This isn\'t your video, you know, i remember seeing this a good while earlier.

Also, technically, that was not an orbit, that was controlled descent. An actual orbit which i did was at 2,3km at an angle, where at one point on the orbit it zips past a mountain top at 17 metres.
